name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior PHP Engineer with over 13 years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, with proficiency in **PHP**, **HTTP**, and **RESTful APIs**. Experienced in web infrastructure and implementing OOP principles, SOLID design principles, and Clean Code practices to create robust software solutions. Skilled in employing design patterns and secure coding practices to enhance application security and maintainability.

Demonstrated ability to mentor junior developers, fostering a collaborative environment with strong problem-solving skills. Adept at deploying applications using **Docker**, ensuring smooth development workflows. Background in the healthcare and financial sectors, focusing on compliance-driven development aligned with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Proven expertise in cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure** and developing AI/ML-powered platforms utilizing technologies like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Strong communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams.
